Themselves said:
"We are the hard rock band "BREAKING GRACE" from Temperance, Michigan. We are currently release our debut album "Redemption Road", The 12 tracks disc was recorded at The Loft in Saline Mi, with Andy and Tim Patalan (Taproot). The mixing and added production was done with Martin Bak of SLR Studios in Windsor On. Marty has helped artists like (Ghost of August, Ashes of Soma) reach multiple radio markets.

The line up forming in 2010 has toured and performed hundreds of shows independently... Supporting National acts like Pop Evil, My Darkest Days, Theory of A Deadman, Zach Myers of Shinedown, Puddle of Mudd, Candlebox, Sevendust, Evans Blue, Adam Gontier of Three days Grace, Taproot and many more. The Band has had songs featured on 89x Windsor, 104.7 Wiot, 101.1 Wrif, 100.7 The Zone and a number of internet and college radio stations. The Band is looking forward to taking this CD to a global audience.

We are currently gearing up and getting ready to take our live show to the road in support of "Redemption Road" The band is making arrangements to tour nationally in the fall of 2014. We are also currently working with awarding winning video and cinematographer Sean Babas on their first Full length video in support of a upcoming single release."

Line-up:
Vocals: Jeremy Rober
Guitar: Johnny Krill
Guitar: Dustin Maroon
Drums: Brandon Gill
Bass: Randy Johnson
